entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 03:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

Humidity: 99 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 20 in the evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
